derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Greek misanthrōpia, from miso- 'hating' + anthrōpos 'man'

entry.def: Misanthropy is a general dislike of people.

means.word_mean: 2. a disposition to dislike and mistrust other people
